meanings.definition: To rebound off a surface in a series of bounces.
meanings.sent1: The ball ricochets off the wall.
meanings.sent2: The stone ricochets off the pavement.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck ricochets off the bathtub walls.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter ricochets through the room like a joyful echo.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the drum ricochets in the empty hall, creating a rhythmic pattern.

meanings.definition: The action of rebounding off a surface in a series of bounces.
meanings.sent1: The ricochets of the ball echoed in the alley.
meanings.sent2: The loud ricochets startled the birds in the park.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected ricochets of the ping pong ball made the game more exciting.
meanings.sent4: The ricochets of memories in her mind kept her awake at night.
meanings.sent5: The ricochets of emotions in his heart were hard to ignore.
